full_summary:
# Building Automation Systems (BAS) Installation, Repairs, and Maintenance [^( cancelled )]

Synopsis
---------

A request for Standing Offer (RSO) RFSO0001 for Building Automation Systems (BAS) Installation, Repairs, and Maintenance was posted on 2023-06-13. Unfortunately, this tender has been [^( cancelled )] on 2023-06-28.

Key Details
------------

*   Solicitation Number: WS3989946810
*   Closing Date: 2023-07-12 (02:00 PM EDT)
*   Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Authorized Trading Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Product/Activity Requirements:
    *   Provide skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation and supervision for building automation systems (BAS) installation, repairs, and maintenance services.
    *   Work is to be performed on an "as and when required basis".
*   Regions of Delivery: Manitoba
*   Regions of Opportunity: None
*   Authorized End User Entities: Department of National Defence (DND)

Procurement Details
-------------------

To learn more about this tender, please refer to the procurement notice provided by Minister of Public Works and Government Services CANADA.

Bidder Requirements
-------------------

*   Ensure all required supporting documentation and bid submissions are received by the specified deadline in the procurement notice.
*   All bids submitted after the deadline will not be considered.

Additional Resources
----------------------

*   Confidential Addendum to the Standing Offer Agreement
*   Building Automation Systems (BAS) Training Manual (draft)
*   BAS Schedule of Rates and Charges [modified]

A downloadable version of the CAN1000 is available through the "Canada: Buyandsell.gc.ca" website.

Interested parties should contact:
[^(Name)] [^(Contact Information)] 
[Minister of Public Works and Government Services Canada]
[Tel:] [Fax:] [Email:]
[Tel::](519) 222-111. [Fax:](519) 222-101. [Email:](christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)]
